articles.author: Ananya Chaudhuri
articles.title: Grasim Set To Disrupt Asian Paints-Led Oligopoly Even As Jefferies Sees Uphill Task - NDTV Profit
articles.description: Jefferies also retained 'underperform' on the stock as it sees a declining trend in revenues in the recent quarter to continue.
articles.content:
Asian Paints Ltd.'s market share and margins are likely to be impacted by Grasim Industries Ltd.'s foray into the paint market, according to Jefferies.
Grasim Industries launched its first paint pla… [+1156 chars]
